visual_description:
Sufganiyot are **golden-brown, round deep-fried doughnuts** with a distinctive pillowy, spongy texture[2]. When served, they appear as individual pastries, typically presented on a plate or platter rather than in a bowl, since they are solid fried treats rather than a soup or stew[1][2].

raw_response:
Sufganiyot are **golden-brown, round deep-fried doughnuts** with a distinctive pillowy, spongy texture[2]. When served, they appear as individual pastries, typically presented on a plate or platter rather than in a bowl, since they are solid fried treats rather than a soup or stew[1][2].

## Visual Appearance
